title: Filipino ribs
ingredients: ['2.75kg (6 lb) pork spareribs', '2 medium onions, cut into wedges', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '6 tablespoons soy sauce', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '6 whole star anise pods', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger', '110g (4 oz) honey', '2 tablespoons brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
